title: Scheduler.step() doesn't perform optimizer.step()
body_html:
It seems counter-intuitive (to the extent I wondered why the hell nothing works, until took a look on weights change between steps, or more accurate it's absence), as scheduler looks like a wrapper over an optimizer.
Moreover, I can't imagine a situation when one would need to do a scheduler's step, but not optimizer's, so writing both is redundant.
